title: Huawei Band 7 launches in China with a 1.47-inch AMOLED display
content:
At Huawei’s recent event, the firm announced its latest entry in its foldable phone lineup the Mate Xs 2. During the event, the company also announced two new wearables, the Huawei Watch GT 3 Pro and the Huawei Band 7. There’s a lot to unpack about the latter, so let’s get started. The Huawei Band originally made its

The post Huawei Band 7 launches in China with a 1.47-inch AMOLED display appeared first on XDA.
description: Huawei announced a new fitness tracker, the Band 7. The Band 7 offers fitness tracking and heart monitoring in a compact size priced at ¥269.
